metadata.title: CVE-2022-24687 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description: HashiCorp Consul and Consul Enterprise 1.9.0 through 1.9.14, 1.10.7, and1.11.2 clusters with at least one Ingress Gateway allow a user withservice:write to register a specifically-defined service that can causeConsul servers to panic. Fixed in 1.9.15, 1.10.8, and 1.11.3.

criterions.comment: consul package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
